revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " 6th, Nekpheros, son of Ischyrion, 12 dr.,;Papontos, son of Nekpheros, 12 dr.,;24,;Mesore 7, year 19,;Peteuchos, son of Nekpheros the embalmer, 4 dr.,;Harmiysis, son of Herakles, [3?]2dr.,;. . ., likewise son of Myk(), [1?]2 dr.,;9th, Ischyrion, son of Mell.u[..]ios, 20 dr.,;Theon, son of Herakles, [16? dr.] with the addition,;Papontos, son of Pisais, [3?]2 dr.,;68,;10th, Ischyrion, son of Panetbeus, 8 dr.,;Horos, Peteous, son of Harphaesis, 4 dr.,;Herakles, son of Hermias, 4 dr.,;Hermias, son of Petearmotos, 4 ;Herakles, son of Nekthme,;Kallis, likewise son of Pnepheros, 8 dr.,;32,;11th, Hareotes, son of Sisois, 20 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Herieus the embalmer, 4 dr.,;Hektor, son of Peteuchos, 12 dr.,;Pantes, son of Pnepheros, 4 dr."
